alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central La Paz; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Northwest Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 10:09PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS WITH POSSIBLE NEW THUNDERSTORM DEVELOPMENT EXPECTED ACROSS SOUTHEASTERN LA PAZ...NORTHEASTERN YUMA AND MARICOPA COUNTIES... At 1003 PM MST, radar indicated a strong outflow boundary pushing through western Maricopa County this evening. Strong winds and reduced visibilities due to blowing dust are expected with some additional thunderstorm development possible. Winds in excess of 40 mph will be possible. Strong, gusty winds will be capable of producing areas of blowing dust with reduced visibilities. Locations impacted include... Buckeye, Gila Bend, Tonopah, Palo Verde, Sentinel, Paloma, White Tank Mountain Park, Bosque, Cotton Center, Painted Rock Dam, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, Dateland, Palo Verde Nuclear Generation Station, Sundad, Mohawk, Wintersburg, Hassayampa, Hyder, and Arlington. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 77 and 118. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 48 and 122. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 11.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Central La Paz; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Northwest Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Southeast Yuma County; Tonopah Desert
